1603655918_15ikhUiQxJkhNQuDUaR1RuUL45p5w.body: Yes. It's not a propaganda. The situation is under control in China despite of some limited spreads in Xinjiang and Qingdao.

1607500928_114FPBgGTFgsfrHMvQYkJ3aAR8zSm.body: Because it is not its season now. Every product has its days. I think only when the general public realise the importance of privacy can P2P products like Zeronet or IPFS become popular.
